results.title: Inhibition of Glucose Metabolism Abrogates the Effector Phase of Bullous Pemphigoid-Like Epidermolysis Bullosa Acquisita.
results.text_hl: We investigated the effect of @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-deoxy-D-glucose@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the antibody transfer model of @<m>DISEASE_Epidermolysis_Bullosa_Acquisita</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016107 @@@EBA@@@.

citations.NLM: Schilf P, Schmitz M, Derenda-Hell A, Thieme M, Bremer T, Vaeth M, Zillikens D, Sadik CD. Inhibition of Glucose Metabolism Abrogates the Effector Phase of Bullous Pemphigoid-Like Epidermolysis Bullosa Acquisita. J Invest Dermatol. 2021 Jul;141(7):1646-1655.e3. PMID: 33609554
